title: "week4-lab"
format: html
---

```{r}
library(here)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
data <- read_csv(here("week4/data/co2_weekly_mlo.csv"), skip = 35, na = c(-999.99, "NA"))
```

```{r}
data |>
  group_by(year) |>
  summarize(avg_avg = mean(average, na.rm = TRUE)) |>
  ggplot(aes(year, avg_avg)) +
  geom_col(fill = "dodgerblue") +
  labs(x = "Year",
       y= "Average Increase (ppm) since 1800",
       title = "Mauna Loa CO2") +
  theme_bw()
```
